ygData.subject: RE: Thank you Brian!  Verant does listen!
ygData.msgSnippet: While I applaud the removal of the useless spells listed, I see the spells them giving us to be equally useless. These spells will only benefit the lower level
ygData.messageBody:
While I applaud the removal of the useless spells listed, I see the spells
them giving us to be equally useless. These spells will only benefit the
lower level Sk's, and even then only in very limited situations (SOLO). In
my opinion this is another example of listening to the majority sheep out
there that get it in their head what would be good for the class without
playing that class to a decent level (30+). I believe that SK's would have
been better served by giving us better offensive spells, or even some
defensive buffs.

These lifetaps are barely adequate for Necros at the levels they get them,
for SK's they would be a gimmick (and again now they can claim that SK's
have healing). I would have much rather seen the skill cap on Bind wound
bumped from 100 to 200.


Oh well just my opinion.

Thom
Occasionally Columnist at the always tasty Voodoo Extreme...
http:\\www.voodooextreme.com

-----Original Message-----
From: Chip Paul [mailto:cpaul@...]
Sent: Friday, October 22, 1999 1:36 PM
To: shadowknight@onelist.com
Subject: [shadowknight] Thank you Brian! Verant does listen!


From: Chip Paul <cpaul@...>

Straight from the test server login...
Thank you Brian for listening to the players. Although some may be
dismayed at the loss of Voice Graft, all in all I don't think anyone
can complain about this one. Let's hope this makes it to the live
servers.

Xilith

October 21st, 10:30am
---------------------

*ShadowKnight Enhancements*

Shadowknights may now use the following spells:

- LifeTap may now be cast at level 9.
- LifeSpike may now be cast at level 15.
- LifeDraw may now be cast at level 30.

The LifeTap, LifeSpike, and LifeDraw spell scrolls may be purchased from
any ShadowKnight spell vendor.

To make room for these new spells, the following spells are no longer
available for ShadowKnights:

- Reclaim Energy
- Mend Bones
- Voice Graft

- The EverQuest Team

-=The Shadow Knight Mailing List=-
-= Support Evil Roleplaying =-
